about_the_game:
Embark on a journey of discovery and wonder as you explore a wide range of colorful and intricate bird puzzles. Encounter a variety of exotic and fascinating bird species that will take your breath away.

Puzzle Images

Count: 50
detailed_description:
Embark on a journey of discovery and wonder as you explore a wide range of colorful and intricate bird puzzles. Encounter a variety of exotic and fascinating bird species that will take your breath away.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13 and above
  • Processor: 2014 or newer Intel Core i5 / AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13 and above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 2GB+ Memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Get ready to spread your wings and soar through a world of stunning avian beauty.
